column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The other family's pizza came out to us
column3: which we immediately alerted the server of. It was offered to us
column4: but it looked disgusting and had extra cheese
column5: which is just not necessary on a deep dish pie. Not surprisingly
column6: based on the service that night
column7: this server who brought our pizza was not the server who took our order. Had it been our original waitress
column8: this whole situation could have easily been avoided. Once we called our original waitress over
column9: she was very flustered at the situation and brought over her manager.
